New Records: Yashasvi Jaiswal broke Rohit Sharma's 13-year-old T20I record for scoring 75-plus runs in a match, becoming the youngest Indian batsman to do so
Key Match Events: Yashasvi Jaiswal and Shubman Gill stitched a solid 165-run stand for the opening wicket, the third-highest partnership (for any wicket) for India in T20Is
Post-Match Reflections: Yashasvi Jaiswal earned the Man of the Match award for his unbeaten 84 runs off 51 balls
Miscellaneous Highlights: India's win against the West Indies was the sixth-biggest win in terms of wickets in T20Is
Yashasvi Jaiswal became the youngest Indian batsman to post 75-plus in T20Is
